description:
A high-school girl who sits in the http://anidb.net/ch19483 [school counselor]`s room and reports that she is hearing a voice inside of her body that`s growing louder.
The school counselor thrusts her hand into the girl`s shoulder and extracts a huge shadow from her body, to the bewilderment of both http://anidb.net/ch9745 [the unnamed protagonist] and http://anidb.net/ch9748 [Tamaki Maiko] who both happen to observe this incident.
name: Joshi Seito
